title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 175.16 - Computation of statewide average approved operating expense per total aidable pupil unit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 175.16 - Computation of statewide average approved operating expense per total aidable pupil unit

State Regulations

The statewide average expense per pupil, for purposes of
subparagraph 1 of paragraph a of subdivision 5 of section
3602
of the

Education Law, shall be determined using year prior to the base-year-approved
operating expense and pupil counts. The commissioner will prepare and estimate
the data for each district which has not submitted such data by such date. The
statewide estimated approved operating expense for the base year will then be
divided by the statewide estimated pupil counts for the base year, and the
result rounded to the nearest $50, to arrive at the statewide average approved
operating expense per total aidable pupil unit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
175.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
